alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 6:16AM CST until January 24 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River at Bigbee ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buttahatchie River...including Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, flood water begins to cover Air Base Road located on the west bank of the river. Low-lying farmland near the river also begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM CST Thursday was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall just below flood stage late tonight to 12.8 feet and then begin rising tomorrow evening. It is then forecast to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 13.8 feet Sunday morning, then quickly fall. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
